CAREER SUMMARY  
 
Oct 2016 to date Ecolab India, Middle East & Africa  
Ecolab, a Fortune 500 company, is the global leader in water, hygiene and energy  
technologies and servi ces. Around the world businesses in foodservice, food 
processing, hospitality, healthcare, industrial, and oil and gas markets choose Ecolab 
products and services to keep their environment clean and safe, operate efficiently and 
achieve sustainability goal s. 
 
Oct 2016 to date  
Position: IMEA Talent Acquisi tion Head  
• Oversee the Talent Acquisition Center of Excellence (CoE) and the 
implementation of Talent Acquisition process improvements to hire top talent  
• Responsible to create and deploy Regional talent acquisition strategies to 
strengthen the organization's capa bilities  
• Designed and facilitated Behavioral -Based Interview Trainings for managers 
across MEA  
• Implemented the Ecolab Employer Brand Promise across the region  
• Responsible to hire executive roles across Middle East & Africa  
• Implemented Workday Recru iting Applicant Tracking System across the region  
• Winner of the Q4 2016 MENA Bravo Excellence Awards for Culture  
 
Nov 2019 to date  
Position: IMEA HR Business Partner ( dual role)  
• Provide HR guidance on strategic initiatives for the Energy Downstream 
business  
• Execu te talent reviews and succession planning  
    
• Lead Sales compensation plans and organization structure work aligned to the 
needs for the global models and expectations  
• Review employee research and engagement results and conduct action 
planning  
• Conduct Wo rkforce Planning and Training Needs Analysis  
• Advise senior business leaders and managers on serious employee relations 
issues and manage risk effectively  
• Establish key communication and change strategies for business events 
impacting people  
 
HR Development:  
• Lead the design and implementation of HR Policies across the region  
• Developed and rolled -out an Onboarding Framework globally  
 
Feb 2017 - Sep 2017  
Position: Acting HR Head, Sub -Saharan Africa  
HR Operations:  
• Led all HR functions for Ecolab Sub -Saharan Africa including recruitment, 
employee relations, compensation, organizational development, talent and 
change management  
• Identified and implemented opportunities for improvement in HR service 
delivery  
• Managed employee relations and disciplinary hearings activities  
• Led key compensation and benefits processes including annual merit planning 
and performance reviews  
• Received a 2017 Spot Award for the excellent contribution and support 
provided to the Sub -Saharan Africa HR team  
 
Dec 2010 to Jun 2016 Clevelan d Clinic Abu Dhabi  
Cleveland Clinic Abu  Dhabi is an initiative of Mubadala, a leading Investment & 
Development Company in  Abu Dhabi, and Cleveland Clinic, one of the top 4 Hospitals 
in USA. Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi has been  considered as the largest and most 
complex healthcare project in the world and th e biggest global  recruitment effort in 
healthcare with hiring occurring in over 65 countries.  
 
Jun 2015 t o Jan 2016 Acting Talent Acquisi tion Directo r

Strategy:

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
